code: import{useContext}from"react";import FavContext from"../../store/fav-context";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ToFavs(props){var FavCtx=useContext(FavContext);var itemIsFav=FavCtx.itemIsFav(props.id);function toggleFavStatHandler(){if(itemIsFav){FavCtx.removeFav(props.id);}else{FavCtx.addFavourite({id:props.id,Title:props.Title,Description:props.Description,Image:props.Image,Address:props.Address,Rate:props.Rate});}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"last:block text-xl hover:text-2xl dark:text-gray-500 dark:bg-slate-950 dark:hover:text-indigo-500 dark:hover:bg-slate-950 hover:bg-indigo-300 bg-white duration-500 md:p-4 py-7 px-10 rounded-b-xl w-full font-urbanist ".concat(props.className),onClick:toggleFavStatHandler,children:itemIsFav?"Remove from Favourites":"To Favourites"})});}export default ToFavs;
